title: Orbbec’s Persee N1 is an all-in-one 3D camera-computer system
description: The Persee N1 is an advanced modular system which combines the high-performance NVIDIA Jetson Nano Quad Core ARM A57 processor with an advanced depth camera. This all-in-one device is equipped with versatile connectivity options including PoE, HDMI, multiple USB ports, etc. The ORBBEC Persee N1 integrates a computational unit based on the NVIDIA Jetson Nano […]
